metadata.title: CVE-2021-47137 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:lantiq: fix memory corruption in RX ring In a situation where memoryallocation or dma mapping fails, an invalid address is programmed into thedescriptor. This can lead to memory corruption. If the memory allocationfails, DMA should reuse the previous skb and mapping and drop the packet.This patch also increments rx drop counter.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
